Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.storage

Interface IStorage

All Known Implementing Classes:
SQLiteJDBCDriverConnection
public interface IStorage
Represents storage of all door related stuff.
Author:
Pim

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    IStorage.DatabaseState
    Represents the status of the database.
    static enum 
    IStorage.DoorFlag
    Set of bit flags to represent various properties of doors.

  • Method Details

    • isValidTableName

      static boolean isValidTableName(String str)
      Checks if a specific String would make for a valid name for a table.
      Parameters:
      str - The String to check.
      Returns:
      True if this String is valid as a table name.

    • removeDoor

      boolean removeDoor(long doorUID)
      Delete the door with the given doorUID from the database.
      Parameters:
      doorUID - The UID of the door to delete.
      Returns:
      True if at least 1 door was successfully removed.

    • removeDoors

      boolean removeDoors(UUID playerUUID, String doorName)
      Delete all doors owned by the given player with the given name.
      Parameters:
      playerUUID - The player whose doors to delete.
      doorName - The name of the doors to delete.
      Returns:
      True if at least 1 door was successfully removed.

    • isBigDoorsWorld

      boolean isBigDoorsWorld(String worldName)
      Checks whether there are any doors in a given world.
      Parameters:
      worldName - The name of the world.
      Returns:
      True if there are more than 0 doors in the given world.

    • getDoorCountForPlayer

      int getDoorCountForPlayer(UUID playerUUID)
      Gets the total number of doors own by the given player.
      Parameters:
      playerUUID - The uuid of the player whose doors to count.
      Returns:
      The total number of doors own by the given player.

    • getDoorCountForPlayer

      int getDoorCountForPlayer(UUID playerUUID, String doorName)
      Gets the number of doors own by the given player with the given name.
      Parameters:
      playerUUID - The uuid of the player whose doors to count.
      doorName - The name of the door to search for.
      Returns:
      The number of doors own by the given player with the given name.

    • updatePlayerData

      boolean updatePlayerData(PPlayerData playerData)
      Updates the PPlayerData for a given player.
      Parameters:
      playerData - The PPlayerData the represents a player.
      Returns:
      True if at least 1 record was modified.

    • getPlayerData

      Optional<PPlayerData> getPlayerData(UUID uuid)
      Tries to find the PPlayerData for a player with the given UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of a player.
      Returns:
      The PPlayerData that represents the player.

    • getPlayerData

      List<PPlayerData> getPlayerData(String playerName)
      Tries to get all the players with a given name. Because names are not unique, this may result in any number of matches.

      If you know the player's UUID, it is recommended to use getPlayerData(UUID) instead.

      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player(s).
      Returns:
      All the players with the given name.

    • getDoorCountByName

      int getDoorCountByName(String doorName)
      Gets the total number of doors with the given name regardless of who owns them.
      Parameters:
      doorName - The name of the doors to search for.
      Returns:
      The total number of doors with the given name.

    • getOwnerCountOfDoor

      int getOwnerCountOfDoor(long doorUID)
      Gets the total number of owners of a door.
      Parameters:
      doorUID - The AbstractDoor.
      Returns:
      The total number of owners of this door.

    • getDoor

      Optional<AbstractDoor> getDoor(UUID playerUUID, long doorUID)
      Gets the door with the given UID for the given player at the level of ownership this player has over this door, if any.
      Parameters:
      playerUUID - The UUID of the player.
      doorUID - The UID of the door to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The door if it exists and if the player is an owner of it.

    • getDoor

      Optional<AbstractDoor> getDoor(long doorUID)
      Gets the door with the given doorUID and the original creator as DoorOwner;
      Parameters:
      doorUID - The UID of the door to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The door with the given doorUID and the original creator.

    • getDoors

      List<AbstractDoor> getDoors(UUID playerUUID, String name)
      Gets all the doors owned by the given player with the given name.
      Parameters:
      playerUUID - The UUID of the player to search for.
      name - The name of the doors to search for.
      Returns:
      All doors owned by the given player with the given name.

    • getDoors

      List<AbstractDoor> getDoors(UUID playerUUID)
      Gets all the doors owned by the given player.
      Parameters:
      playerUUID - The UUID of the player to search for.
      Returns:
      All doors owned by the given player.

    • getDoors

      List<AbstractDoor> getDoors(String name)
      Gets all the doors with the given name, regardless of who owns them.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the doors to search for.
      Returns:
      All doors with the given name or an empty Optional if none exist.

    • getDoors

      List<AbstractDoor> getDoors(UUID playerUUID, String doorName, int maxPermission)
      Gets all the doors with the given name, owned by the player with at least a certain permission level.
      Parameters:
      playerUUID - The name of the player who owns the doors.
      doorName - The name of the doors to search for.
      maxPermission - The maximum level of ownership (inclusive) this player has over the doors.
      Returns:
      All the doors with the given name, owned the player with at least a certain permission level.

    • getDoors

      List<AbstractDoor> getDoors(UUID playerUUID, int maxPermission)
      Gets all the doors owned by a given player with at least a certain permission level.
      Parameters:
      playerUUID - The name of the player who owns the doors.
      maxPermission - The maximum level of ownership (inclusive) this player has over the doors.
      Returns:
      All the doors owned by the player with at least a certain permission level.

    • getPowerBlockData

      ConcurrentHashMap<Integer,List<Long>> getPowerBlockData(long chunkId)
      Gets a map of location hashes and their connected powerblocks for all doors in a chunk.

      The key is the hashed location in chunk space, the value is the list of UIDs of the doors whose powerblocks occupies that location.

      Parameters:
      chunkId - The id of the chunk the doors are in.
      Returns:
      A map of location hashes and their connected powerblocks for all doors in a chunk.

    • getDoorsInChunk

      List<Long> getDoorsInChunk(long chunkId)
      Gets a list of door UIDs that have their rotation point in a given chunk.
      Parameters:
      chunkId - The id of the chunk the doors are in.
      Returns:
      A list of door UIDs that have their rotation point in a given chunk.

    • insert

      Optional<AbstractDoor> insert(AbstractDoor door)
      Inserts a new door in the database. If the insertion was successful, a new AbstractDoor will be created with the correct doorUID.
      Parameters:
      door - The door to insert.
      Returns:
      The AbstractDoor that was just inserted if insertion was successful. This is NOT!! the same object as the one passed to this method.

    • syncDoorData

      boolean syncDoorData(DoorBase doorBase, byte[] typeData)
      Synchronizes an AbstractDoor door with the database. This will synchronize both the base and the type-specific data of the AbstractDoor.
      Parameters:
      doorBase - The DoorBase that describes the base data of door.
      typeData - The type-specific data of this door.
      Returns:
      True if the update was successful.

    • deleteDoorType

      boolean deleteDoorType(DoorType doorType)
      Deletes a DoorType and all AbstractDoors of this type from the database.

      Note that the DoorType has to be registered before it can be deleted! It doesn't need to be enabled, though.

      Parameters:
      doorType - The DoorType to delete.
      Returns:
      True if deletion was successful.

    • removeOwner

      boolean removeOwner(long doorUID, UUID playerUUID)
      Removes an owner of a door. Note that the original creator (= permission level 0) can never be removed.
      Parameters:
      doorUID - The UID of the door to modify.
      playerUUID - The UUID of the player to remove as owner of the door.
      Returns:
      True if an owner was removed.

    • addOwner

      boolean addOwner(long doorUID, PPlayerData player, int permission)
      Adds a player as owner of a door with at a certain permission level to a door.

      Note that permission level 0 is reserved for the creator, and negative values are not allowed.

      Parameters:
      doorUID - The UID of the door to modify.
      player - The player to add as owner.
      permission - The level of ownership the player will have over the door.
      Returns:
      True if the update was successful.

    • getFlag

      default long getFlag(AbstractDoor door)
      Gets the flag value of various boolean properties of a AbstractDoor.
      Parameters:
      door - The AbstractDoor.
      Returns:
      The flag value of a AbstractDoor.

    • getFlag

      default long getFlag(boolean isOpen, boolean isLocked)
      Gets the flag value of various boolean properties of a AbstractDoor.
      Parameters:
      isOpen - Whether the door is currently open.
      isLocked - Whether the door is currently locked.
      Returns:
      The flag value of a AbstractDoor.

    • getDatabaseState

      IStorage.DatabaseState getDatabaseState()
      Obtains IStorage.DatabaseState the database is in.
      Returns:
      The IStorage.DatabaseState the database is in.
